Class SettingsPage

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.ui.SettingsPage
public class SettingsPage extends Object
The SettingsPage class represents a user interface for managing game settings such as key bindings and audio volume levels for background music (BGM) and sound effects (SFX).

  • Field Summary

    Field

    • createVolumeControl

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox createVolumeControl(String labelText, javafx.scene.control.Slider slider, javafx.scene.control.Label volumeLabel)
      Creates a volume control UI element with a slider and a label.
      Parameters:
      labelText - The label text for the control.
      slider - The slider to adjust the volume.
      volumeLabel - The label to display the current volume percentage.
      Returns:
      An HBox containing the volume control elements.

    • createKeySetting

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox createKeySetting(String labelText, javafx.scene.input.KeyCode currentKey, Consumer<javafx.scene.input.KeyCode> setter, Consumer<javafx.scene.control.Button> buttonReference)
      Creates a key binding configuration UI element.
      Parameters:
      labelText - The label text for the control.
      currentKey - The current key binding.
      setter - A consumer to update the key binding.
      buttonReference - A consumer to update the button reference.
      Returns:
      A VBox containing the key binding configuration elements.

      action - The action to perform when the button is clicked.
      Returns:
